description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fight your way through waves of ships in this 3D arcade style space shooter! Use your laser blasters and specialized weapons called "Pods" to destroy your enemies. The Pods' effects range from giving your ship a speed boost to creating a gravity well to suck in your enemies. Rack up the points in Survival or play through Arcade mode where you'll fight your way through to face the capital ships!
